blend

blend.Rd

Blend multiple layers of images into various combinations

blend(
  name = "fig",
  folder_out = "output",
  folder_animate = NULL,
  fps = 2,
  morph = F,
  frames = 10,
  folder1 = NULL,
  colors1 = NULL,
  folder2 = NULL,
  colors2 = NULL,
  folder3 = NULL,
  colors3 = NULL,
  folder4 = NULL,
  colors4 = NULL,
  folder5 = NULL,
  colors5 = NULL
)

Arguments

name

Default = "fig". Base name of figure. Will be appended with numbers for each blend.
folder_out

Default = "output". Name of folder to save figs in.
folder_animate

Default = NULL. Path to folder with animations
fps

Default = 2. Frames per second for animations
morph

Default = F. Morph animations
frames

Default = 10. Frames used for morphing
folder1

Default = NULL. Folder with images for layer 1.
colors1

Default = NULL. (OPTIONAL) List of colors to combine for layer 1 images.
folder2

Default = NULL. Folder with images for layer 2.
colors2

Default = NULL. (OPTIONAL) List of colors to combine for layer 2 images.
folder3

Default = NULL. Folder with images for layer 3.
colors3

Default = NULL. (OPTIONAL) List of colors to combine for layer 3 images.
folder4

Default = NULL. Folder with images for layer 4.
colors4

Default = NULL. (OPTIONAL) List of colors to combine for layer 4 images.
folder5

Default = NULL. Folder with images for layer 5.
colors5

Default = NULL. (OPTIONAL) List of colors to combine for layer 5 images.

Value

blended images
